ygData.subject: Re: Bilge
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t heard of him spawning on the island... the few people i ve known who ve seen him say he spawns either near unrest or near the orc camp... I don t
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't heard of him spawning on the island... the few people i've known
who've seen him say he spawns either near unrest or near the orc camp... I
don't know which or if either is true... I do know though that he paths
towards the paladan hero camp near the BB zone. He was killed by those NPC
Paladins a couple of times while I was hunting him. I ended up getting my
Bilge ingot after a druid killed Bilge and looted the cleric item... I paid
him 50pp to go to Solusek Ro with me and turn it in so that I could turn in
the rest of the quest items, thus getting the chestplate.

-Eachann Bronzeleaf
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Tom <imgargoyle@...>
To: EQ Clerics <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, January 28, 2000 12:12 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Bilge


> From: Tom <imgargoyle@...>
>
> Hello there fellow clerics. Just wanted to see if anyone here knows the
> general location where Bilge spawns in the cauldron and if there is a
> trick to get him to spawn other than killing every wandering goblin in
> sight. Somone told me he spawns on the island on the very top, but
> I have never seen the dirty critter yet.
>
> Exok Grimstone
> Gnomish cleric
> Veeshan server
>
